import React from "react"; const HomePage = () => (

ðŸš¨Important!!ðŸš¨

This is just a **prototype/experiment** used to see how the Design Tokens work together to create UIs.

  • This is not an implementation spec.
  • This is throw away code used to illustrate a concept and propose an organization structure for design tokens.
  • The organizational architecture is meant to be used by both{" "} Designers and Developers in all platforms.
  • The organizational architecture inspired by:
    • Polaris Design System (Shopify)
    • Carbon Design System (IBM)
    • Material (Google)
    • Lighting (Salesforce)
    • Inverted Triangle of CSS
    • Design Tokens post by Nathan Curtis
    • Design Tokens for Dummies

For more info check out{" "} this deck {" "} explaining the rationale.

); export default HomePage;
